name: Galaxy F13
hightlight: Samsung has started teasing the Galaxy F13, a smartphone that turned up in April on Geekbench. As the image below shows, the Galaxy F13 will be available in three colours with a design that resembles recent Galaxy A and Galaxy M series devices. Additionally, the Galaxy F13 has a 1080p display, unlike the Galaxy M13.
descriptions: Samsung has started teasing the Galaxy F13, a smartphone that turned up in April on Geekbench. name: Havit Speaker (SK473)
hightlight: Lenovo HE05 Wireless In-Ear Neckband Earphones - Black
descriptions: Main Features:It features BT 5.0 technology, convenient for you to connect it to your smartphone, with CVC noise-canceling mic, the earphones get rid of static and environmental noises during phone calls, so that you can have clearer and more stable calls.Top-grade loudspeakers, giving you all-around stereo sound, perfect for playing games.Built-in 80mAh rechargeable battery, giving it a standby time of 120 hours and continuous working time for about 8 hours. When connected to your phone, the battery capacity of the earphones will be shown on your phone so that you can know when to charge your earphones easily.With buttons on earphones, you can play/pause music, adjust volume and answer/end calls with one simple operation on the earphones.Made from qualified metal and silicone material, it's dust-proof, sweatproof, and waterproof, great for your daily use.Ergonomic and magnetic design, lightweight and very flexible, can be bent to any shape, easy to store.Wireless earphones, which sets your hands free and gives you more convenience for sports.Comes in 3 different sizes of ear tips, meeting different needs for different ears, it will be more comfortable to wear.
